description: [``botocore``] Amazon Bedrock Batch Inference/ Model Invocation is a feature which allows customers to asynchronously run inference on a large set of records/files stored in S3.
[``botocore``] AWS CodeBuild now supports creating fleets with macOS platform for running builds.
[``botocore``] This release adds additional search fields and provides sorting by multiple fields.

[``botocore``] Release Lambda FunctionRecursiveConfig, enabling customers to turn recursive loop detection on or off on individual functions. This release adds two new APIs, GetFunctionRecursionConfig and PutFunctionRecursionConfig.
[``botocore``] Add new attributes to the outputs of GetApplication and GetDatabase APIs.
